channel.title: Plz help me fix my agility code

item.title: Plz help me fix my agility code
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

if(objectID == 2282 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ sM("You attempt to cross the rope"); actionInterval = 3000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); int chance = misc.random(2); if(chance==1){ sM("You cross the rope!"); toX = 2551; toY = 3549; addSkillXP(5000, 16); } else sM("You fail to cross the rope"); toX = 2551; toY = 9952; int hitdmg = 5; currentHealth -= hitdmg; } }

prety much if i cross the rop i still tele to 2551 9952, but i dont get fail to cross rope message and i get xp added, and the damage dealer isn’t working…

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help me fix my agility code
